content.detailedDescription: My two adult sons and myself were in the back yard around 7 pm, and my youngest son who has excellent vision saw a faint light (equivalent to low magnitude star)moving across the night sky, appearing to be a satellite, although in a roughly south to north direction. my other son and myself took a few seconds to find it and then all of us observed an immediate intensification of the light to a venus or greater brightness and then after a second the light went back to the original faint point of light that it was originally. the track of the light was not straight, appearing to be curving slightly, as it was approximately 70 to 80 degrees above the horizon. after a few seconds it once again intensified in brightness, although only about half of the brightness of before. it did this one more time after another few seconds of observation, and then the really bizarre event happened - the light diminished with a distinct small single point of white light with a small red light appearing to orbit it; creating a halo effect around the white light. this all was happening while the light continued to move across the sky, and only for a second. we all saw this and watched the single white light diminsh in intensity and fade away into the night sky.
content.summary: Faint star-like object moving across night sky went extremely bright and turned into faint light with red light orbiting it

content.detailedDescription: My son was playing a baseball game in hitchcock, texas.  we did not see it until we viewed the picture later.  i saw a few more pictures just like this on other web sites.  just wondering if you could give me more information.
content.summary: Diamond shaped object in photo

content.detailedDescription:
A carpenter and myself were installing wooden flooring in my house out on the prairie in the foothills of northern colorado, 2 miles west of rawhide energy plant, 2 miles east of the front mountain range. it was near midday and very clear blue skies, no wind, cool about 70 degrees f. it is a very rural area with ranches all around but miles between them.

we both stepped outside for a break and what caused us to look skyward was the enormous number of contrails at high altitude crossing the mountains. we had never seen that many commercial aircraft going both east and west. as we looked up directly overhead, we both saw a small hovering object, right above us perhaps by a few hundred feet or more, hanging motionless. it was easily seen, in broad daylight. it was a device unknown to me, as i am an ex military and ex flight school candidate and familiar with aircraft and helicopters.

it was a faceted shape, very much like an old lunar lander in appearance, but with no landing legs or protrusions. on the underside, which i assume we were staring up at, were two large globes. my carpenter asked "what is that?" and as we both stared at it, i said i really don't know. this thing hung over us for some seconds, then a faint glow rose up in the two globes and it slowly began to move. we watched it slowly accelerate to a moderate speed and gain a little altitude as it flew north / northeast toward wyoming only 20 miles away. once it was no longer overhead i could clearly see the angular faceted shape of the body and the two globes on the underside. i estimate 1000-1200 ft altitude initially in hover, gaining up to 2000-2500 upon exiting the area north. we watched it until it was out of visual range.
it made no noise at all. the overall color of the device was a very subdued dark green-grey, very much like a military aircraft color. we speculated among ourselves at the time that this could be a military surveillance probe in testing, but if so it uses a technology for flight that is not yet public knowledge, as it had no wings, no rotors, no visible means of support other than twin glowing globes on its' underside. and it was silent, transitioned smoothly from hover to level flight, accelerated very gradually, and displayed no erratic or sudden radical maneuvering. it was however not a conventional air vehicle.

withing a few days, we found a dead antelope about 50-60 yds from the southeast corner of the house. antelope are very common in large herds in this area. this however was odd as it appeared to be a fairly young healthy animal and was not attacked by predators. it was lying on its' side, quite dead, with a large round hole in it's left hindquarter, bigger than any firearm other than a 40mm grenade launcher could make. no scorching, no blood, and no exit wound. just this big perfectly round hole. within two days, coyotes reduced the carcass to clean bones and we found no trace of metallic projectiles or shot. we have no idea what killed this animal.

we do not know if there is a connection between the two events, but it is curious how close together they occurred.
content.summary: Angular  hovering craft

content.detailedDescription: My home sits slightly on a hill, i always look out the front window to see what is it like outside. i looked outside and seen a flashing object in the sky to the south and it was just sitting in one spot. i thought it might be a satilite in the sky but it was flashing multicolored lights rapidly colors of red, blue, yellow, green and white. it was miles away from me i could not estimate how far away it was but it was just in the sky above the tree line making it visible in the skyline. my wife and sister seen it as well i could see it then started moving in short movements from side to side and up and down. i snaped some photos of it with my digital camera and put them on my computer to take a look at what it might be.I,m still not sure what is or was because later it was gone out of sight. but my sister insists it is a satilite. i took the photo and zoomed in to the object and it is whatever it is? i dont know.
content.summary: Flashing lights very rapid multicolored red,green,blue,yellow and white

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday november 18, 2006... it was a nice day, cool, bright and cloudless.  my wife decided we should have lunch outdoors at the oso park in west phoenix.  after getting snacks and drinks at the food city supermarket on 91st ave and thomas rd we headed to the park.  it was 2:45pm, there was a lot of families at the park and all the benches and trees close to the basketball and volleyball courts were already taken, so we headed towards the south side of the park, and picked a tree southeast of the amphitheater... we laid on the grass a blanket we had with us, and after taking care of the snacks, we laid on the blanket facing up the blue sky, my feet were oriented to the east.  i was admiring the nice blue sky, when all of the sudden i saw a bright metallic round shape object appeared up high in the sky; i told my wife "look, there's something up there", after seeing the object, she said "it must be a hot air balloon" - i replied, "no way, that's too high".  the object started to move north in a straigh line and steady speed.  i told my wife "look, it's moving north", and she said "there must be some air blowing up there"... after several seconds, the object switched direction now going south at the same speed, it didn't make a u-turn, it just stopped and headed south.  i told my wife, "it's going south now"; she replied, "the air must have changed course up there".  the ufo continued moving south, when it pass the point where it first appeared, i noticed a second one further above, it was descending.  i said "there's two of them now"; my wife didn't say anything.  the first ufo continued moving south, when it travelled close to the same distance it had travelled north, it suddenly changed directions again.  it went north a high rate of speed, the second ufo joined it and both flew north very fast.  to my amazement, a third ufo descended in the same spot where the first two had appeared, and without wasting time, it follow up the other two at an incredible speed... conclusions: aproximate altitud 60,000 feet; drifting speed of first ufo was around 1000 mph; final speed 10,000 mph; ufos size over 300 feet in diameter; the color was aluminum.
the animation reflects exactly what i saw.  i don't smoke, i don't do prescribed or illegal drugs, i'm not an alcoholic drinker.  my mind was completely lucid... it was a great day!
content.summary: 3 disc shape ufo - phx az

content.detailedDescription: I've been noticing a lot of strange lights in sacramento's skies lately...I've always watched the skies at night and never have i seen the activity i've seen this past week. this particular night i had already seen a light similar to the one i'm about to describe. they seem like plane lights, but there are no blinking lights, in fact, it is like one big bright light. and it doesn't fly the same or make any sound, like a plane would. so my boyfriend and i were on a drive and we got off i-50 on sunrise going north...As we turned facing north i looked up and saw one of the bright lights i've been seeing...So i decided to just watch it and see what it would do. it was flying towards us...With some speed, not as much as an airplane might...Then it got over a big building, i *think* it was a hotel, but i'm not positive...Well, as soon as it got over the building. it stopped. it was so abrupt, at first i wondered if i was actually sure which direction it was moving in...Except that i realized it wasn't moving the opposite direction either. just hovering. after about a minute and a half of hovering, it disappeared. i have to say, this object wasn't far from where i was viewing it. we were on an overpass and the hotel was to the right of us on the other side of the overpass...
content.summary: Aircraft lights hover unlike any aircraft i've ever seen....

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday november 18, 2006... it was a nice day, cool, bright and cloudless.  my wife decided we should have lunch outdoors at the oso park in west phoenix.  after getting snacks and drinks at the food city supermarket on 91st ave and thomas rd we headed to the park.  it was 2:45pm, there was a lot of families at the park and all the benches and trees close to the basketball and volleyball courts were already taken, so we headed towards the south side of the park, and picked a tree southeast of the amphitheater... we laid on the grass a blanket we had with us, and after taking care of the snacks, we laid on the blanket facing up the blue sky, my feet were oriented to the east.  i was admiring the nice blue sky, when all of the sudden i saw a bright metallic round shape object appeared up high in the sky; the animation reflects exactly what i saw.  i don't smoke, i don't do prescribed or illegal drugs, i'm not an alcoholic drinker.  my mind was completely lucid... it was a great day!
content.summary: 3 disc shape ufo - phx az

content.detailedDescription: I was out on the ranch this warm, clear night, the stars were bright so i was going to view them through my telescope and recently acquired nv optics.  the navy trainers (nas kingsville) were both up there, but this time i noticed something different - there was a third fixed wing jet flying in long cirlces around the two and there was a prop plane awac-like flying even further out long circles - i viewed them through my telescope - the two jets were flying lower than normal and were sticking together, they usually split up, this time they were one in front and on top of the other.  i then viewed the sky with my nv optics - gen3 - mil.Spec type stuff and i saw clearly a large triangular black object that these jets were following and flying around.  there was no jet propulsion or heat signatures registering on my nv, i saw what looked like interior or cockpit lights emanating from the object.  there were no exterior lights on this object, to the naked eye it was not visible, even with the aid of good field glasses.  i thought it might be some large helicopter doing drug interdiction, but it just moved oddly and then seemed to seperate into three objects instead of one, so i thought it was a formation of helicopters, but they moved with precision and symmetry i had never known or guessed possible and in directions and angles that didn't jibe with my view of physics and aeronautics, so i sought a second opinion and asked someone else to "look up there and tell me what you see", then with the aid of binoculars and a telescope, then with the night vision, my friend, was amazed, thought helicopters too but one big black one.  we could clearly see the shape of the object on the night sky and what looked like cockpit lights.  i went in to get a camera and came back and they were gone, but the jets lingered a few minutes, then they were gone.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observing night sky with gen3 nightvision goggles viewed flying object invisible to naked eye and silent followed by fixed wing aircraft

content.detailedDescription:
Since 1972 i had hoped that others would have submitted a report to mufon, but since none have been forthcoming i figure this report might jar other peoples memories. it was a big event and was reported in the local newspaper as "stange object seen over north shore." (salem, ma june 1972)
early evening i was driving with my friend when i noticed a bright object in the sky just above the tree tops. i got out of the vehicle and watched the oject move very slowly through the night sky. it was cigar shaped with square windows and round spot lights between the square windows. there was also the shape of a form moving inside one of the square windows but i could not make out the form clearly. the object was approximately 100 feet wide and made no sound and was moving very slowly  above the tree tops. i watched the object for a few more minutes and decided to head to another viewpoint. when i got to a higher overlook in the direction the object was moving i got out of my vehicle to locate the object again. i did not locate the object a second time but the police arrived and asked me what i was doing there. when i told them what i witnessed they told me they had followed the object from the other side of town. the next day there was an article in the paper which i had cut out and brought to school to share with my friends. i have never forgotten about what i witnessed that night in the sky.I reported the event to a ufo investigator a few years back (2005) and was dismayed about their efforts in helping me document the sighting. they could never locate the article in the newspaper and i had about given up trying to promote it any longer without the article. since i now live in oregon i gave it one more shot and called the salem public library. the librarian said they couldnt send me their collection but would make a personal effort to help me find the article. a few weeks later i got some great news about the sighting. the librarian sent me the newspaper article and another article written from a mr. katz who also witnessed the sighting. his article was amazing to read because he describes exactly what i had seen that night. mr katz tried to share his sighting to make it as public as possible and goes on to describe how he got a call from a government official that told him to "drop it." which is also documented in his article. hundreds of people witnessed the sighting that june in 1972. at least that is what the newspaper said. i called the ufo investigator a short time after i received the article and his reply was surprising. he told me i was at the end of the road with the sighting. he stated, "what i witnessed was a slow moving aircraft carrying a lit sign." this is no way what i had seen moving so close above the trees. to this day i feel the response from the investigator is suspicious. just like mr. katz was told to drop his story, i have to wonder why the investigator sounded so sure i was only watching a slow moving aircraft carrying a lit sign. i think it's time for me to put my sighting to rest and thank mufon for letting me get my story out.  mr katz, i hope you will report your sighting here. or anyone that seen what was in the sky that night please report it. one more interesting point i found out from mr katz's article was that the electric power was interrupted to homes in the area where the object was seen.
content.summary: Many people witnessed this event

content.detailedDescription:
i was at the field next to my apartment complex (30 yards from backdoor)waiting for my dog to "make".  as ususal i was watchng the sky towards the south/southwest.  usually there are many planes in the sky (i stand facing d/fw airport which is like 20 miles away) to draw my attention.  i always look at them  till i am convinced its a plane before i look to the next one.   i frequently look behind myself to make sure no one is walking behind me because my dog will react by running or barking unless i tell her to go farther into the field before she sees them. anyway.

    i looked back behind me and noticed a light moving northwest flying faster than normal, especially for the height it seemed to be at( it was definitly higher than most of the planes that seem to be leaving or headed to dfw, but not as high as a plane flying long distance above you) and i watched it travel over me in a straight path and a steady speed until it went completly past me.  i couldnt see it from the back like a plane that had just passed, although there were very thin, fast moving clouds.  the light looked larger, and much wider than a plane's and only pointed forward. i seemed attached to the under side of something maybe twice the size of a big jet but i couldnt really make out any details.  i did hear the delayed noise like the kind that a jet makes but it was much lower, i remember it almost like a ominous sound from a movie.  once it passed i followed my dog to the back door and inside told my friend what i saw.  she looked at me like she felt sorry for me and disappointed in me at the same time.  i asked her to come outside with me and watch the sky and she said no and continued watching some reality show garbage on tv.  i went back to the side ofthe field and watch the sky for about five minuets until my neck started to hurt and went inside.  after maybe ten minuets i went on my back patio to smoke, and moved my chair and leaned it back so i could see the sky without looking up.  mostly i was just looking at all the differant stars seeing what shapes i could make.  


     then, coming from the east/southeast i saw an upright clyindrical object floating through the sky.   i was shocked, i lost my breath and stood up.  it kept moving in a straight path much slower than an airplane and the closer it got the better i could see it.  it was similar to the dimensions of a waterheater like in a home except more rounded,and i remember it being slightly fatter at the bottom, like a streched out egg shape.  it moved at a steady pace far below the clouds that patched the sky, and as it moved it was slowly rotating or rocking a little around i guess its center-axis, but it always stayed upright.  when it got between me and the moon (which was very bright), the moonlight feflected of it and i could see it very well.  it had no color , but it reminded me of clay or dim rubber in texture.  there were no seems in it anywhere or openings i clould see.  at that point it didnt seem even two football fields above the ground.  it passed the side of my apartment and and out of my field of view.  for a brief second i hesitated to follow it, i wanted to get my friend to see it, but i decided to run around the corner and it kept moving into the distance.
content.summary: I saw an upright cylindrical object silently pass approx. 200 yards up.  low flying. clay-like texture.  i got a great look when it flew in front of moon.

content.detailedDescription: Walking towards the east and taking pictures with a sony dsc camera of a cloud formation to the south. after veiwing the photos on my computer monitor i realized that one of several shots, which were taken very rapidly as i was walking, contained the anomally which can be seen in the lower center of the photo. comments, questions and explanations welcome.
content.summary: Did not realize the event took place until i saw picture

content.detailedDescription:
Hi: i lived in teheran from 1975 through 1977  and personally witnessed this event!  i can confirm segments of this event.
see other links for reference:

http://www.Fufor.Com/case760919.Htm
http://brumac.8k.Com/iranjetcase/iranian%20jet%20case%5b1%5d.Pdf
http://www.Nicap.Org/tehrandir.Htm
http://images.Google.Com/imgres?Imgurl=http://www.Mufon.Com/bob_pratt/iran.Jpg&imgrefurl=http://www.Mufon.Com/bob_pratt/classic.Html&h=192&w=250&sz=10&hl=en&start=4&sig2=use3ykeqoh4irfsdpuuuia&tbnid=q58s9kudbfpagm:&tbnh=85&tbnw=111&ei=bjezr-g0moo4iagsj-mkcq&prev=/images%3fq%3dufo%2biran%26gbv%3d2%26hl%3den%26sa%3dg

i went to iranzamin high school - graduated in spring 1977.
 
my dad was an ex-pakistan air force officer, living and working in iran  for  iran air. he worked at the airport and when he got to the office the next morning, he also talked to many witnesses at the airport that saw the same and told me of the scrambling of the f4's and that the instrumentation was jammed.  i saw the f4 drop in the sky when it got close to the ufo.. very exciting for a 16-year old!
 
i lived in the mid-central part of the city - about 4.5 miles east of the  commercial airport,. near 24-esfand square (the heart of the city). right next to the teheran university.  

i lived in a high-rise flat with my dad and was studying at late night for school exam (between 12:30am and 1:00am) when i heard the engines of fighter airplanes (phantom(s))streak across the sky.  having been an ex-air force officer kid, i have always been fascinated by aircraft and know the distinctive sounds of fighters, i knew these were likely f4-phantoms.  i knew this as i have lived next to air bases all my life, and knew that these were phantoms and they were flying very low - too low and too fast. so, something was up! i immediately went to the rooftop of the flat and witnessed the part of the event, after the f4's (both) were in the sky. from when they tried to "fire on the ufo, and got jammed".

i saw the light (bright, rapidly alternating glows/colors from white, to red, to blue, orange) basically 'toy' with the aircraft!  zipping left and traveled up and down the roofs of homes across the city towards the south of my vantage point (looking downhill, visibility was perfest as it was a very clear fall night and i could see for 30-40 miles for sure without obstruction because of the downhill grade of the land moving gradually away from the teheran mountain range). 

i watched the event for about 10 minutes towards the end i saw the smaller object exit the large craft far in the distance and go towards the ground it was in a se direction from teheran.

i lost sight of the craft after it deposited the smaller craft towards the ground, it traveled away from that location and then moved slowly away, then all of a sudden it zipped across the sky at a very high rate. like a fast meteor! but in reverse back up towards the sky.

there was no doubt in my mind at that time that this was a fantastic object not of this earth!    later the next day, my dad heard the rest of the facts from people at the airport as i noted above, and all the pieces then made sense.
 
i am so glad to see this information now available to the public as i know what i saw and about 9 years ago i heard of someone on art bell talking about it and they wanted more people to verify the event.  i was unable to call in then, but i am glad this is as well documented and confirmed as i saw now - thanks to the internet for making this happen.
content.summary: Teheran, iran - two f4 phantoms intercept a ufo over the city

content.detailedDescription:
On the above date and time, a columbus georgia citizen phoned the local 911 center to report a possible downed aircraft.  

the events described in the accompanying field investigator's report outline the resulting later account given to the national ufo reporting center by a third party that had no knowledge at the time of the resulting ground search for the alleged downed aircraft.  this inquiry was mounted as a joint investigation with nuforc.

tom sheets, sd mufonga, 13feb08
content.summary: Columbus georgia witness phones 911--possible downed aircraft

content.detailedDescription:
At approx: 1945 hrs. i was heading south on m-24 from caro, mi. while on m-24 near cass city road i noticed to the north-east a very bright yellow light high in the sky. in a matter of a few seconds another light appeared very close to the first. these lights seemed to be a great distance away from me at the time. never did i observe the lights move. i was only able to see these lights for approx: 1-2 minutes before both lights disappeared at the same time. i kept looking to the northeast on my way home, but never saw the lights again.

at approx: 2045 hrs i was driving on sebewaing rd. toward bad axe, mi with my brother. shortly after leaving the house my brother stated that on his way home from work (in bay city, mi) he observed a single light to the north east for approx: 5 minutes. i then mentioned that i saw 2 lights in the same area. my brother described the light he saw as a yellowish tinted light that seemed to stay in one place, then disappear. my brother then pointed out the area where he saw the lights, as we both looked to that area we saw what seemed to be a very different formation of lights in the same area. this time there were 4 dimmer lights lined up in a strait line, but tilted at about a 45 degree angle in the sky. these lights were observed for approx: 1 minute before the lights disappeared. this time the lights went out one by one, and completely disappeared in about 5-6 seconds. at that time i looked at the clock to get a time. the clock stated it was 2045 hrs.
content.summary: Observed large object in northern sky at two seperate times 1 hour apart // was observed by two persons

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were in the crex meadows waiting for a friend and i was just looking around the sky i have seen other strange things in the sky at the crex meadows but i noticed lights way off in the horizon two dim ones and one bright one the bright one would fade and then get bright it seemed to dance in every direction we watched for a while it would shoot across the sky and come to a dead stop then go the opposite direction at high speed something shot out of it it looked like a shooting star but it was going up into the sky within a seconed the object was directly in front of us i could see the bright light circled the craft the bright light stopped and pointed at us i felt as if whatever it was,was interested in us my brother was in the drivers seat of our van and paniced and we hauld ass out of there when we got to the road i looked out the window to see if it was still chasing us and it was almost right obove us i got a good look at it and it was acorn shaped and it was like i could see through it we continued to drive to anybody we could find to wittness what was chasing us but when we got to town it had disapeared my brother and i have never felt that kind of fear ever there is no way to explain that kind of fear
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Acorn transparent

content.detailedDescription:
In mbour, senegal, ( 14deg.,25 min. n , 17 deg. w ) at about midnight, looking at the sky out over the atlantic ocean ( i.E. on the west coast of africa looking to the west). i was alone outside the hotel, just killing time waiting for my girlfriend to get ready. i observed what i "knew" to be a satellite, which of course appears as a point of light, moving slowly and steadily from generally north to south almost overhead but a little to my west.

after about 30 seconds of this, it suddenly stopped for about 1 second, moved quickly and erratically in a small area near where it had stopped, and then took off at a notably higher rate of speed to the southwest. eventually it disappeared due to distance.

immediately the hair on the back of my neck stood up, and i felt a cold chill throughout my body. i was mortified by what i saw. my first rational thought was " sob! so it's been true all along - they really do exist".

seeing conditions were clear with very little cloud cover and essentially no light pollution.

 as for the observer, i am a casual amateur astronomer who has spent many hundreds of hours observing through a telescope, binoculars, and w/ the naked eye. i'm familiar with astronomical, aeronautical and atmospheric phenomena, none of which can explain this sighting. 

oh, and one more thing - until it happened, i didn't believe in ufo's.
(note-i reported this to nuforc in 2005.)
content.summary: Apparent satellite stopped, moved erratically, then changed speed and course.

content.detailedDescription:
I had to guess on duraationg because this is maybe a landing spot if i didnt put anyting for durationg then the form will not go through..
  ok .. well i walked outside and hubby asked me what happened to the yard i  said i dont know .. there was this circle of dead grass and a ssquare .. i had a thought ufo .But didnt say anything.. i kept my opinion to my self . then i found out the kids didnt tapmper with the yard ..I finally took a pic with my cell phone on sunday .. got alot of reponsses back ppl saying it looked like a landing spot of small ufo...I then called and a policeman came out monday and he said he never seen anything like it .. i asked him what would he do .. he said soil samples . i called the ppl from the county they dont check for low radiaon levels . but they came out tuesday and looked at it and said they never seen anything like it .. and told me to get a ufo investigator out here they didnt take samples.. grass is begining to  come back on the lower part of the circle and square now the land is not flat no pool or trampoline was ever there .. not much that i can really say about the spot .. but i will send the picture ..I have already but this way it might be seen sooner ..Any imput would be great .. i do not want media .. or govt involved.. i have children that wouldnt appreciate publicity .. we talked about it . i will say this if it is a landing spot no one in my house was harmed and i still feel safe . i am  not affraid .. if it is i feel it is comforting to me ..
content.summary: Possible landing spot ... in yard ..

content.detailedDescription:
My husband came to the door yelling for me to come look outside. there two bright, bright white lights about the size of a street light if you were a block away from one, slowly discending from the sky.  they were coming from the south heading north.  one was slower than the other. one eventually blinked out to where we couldn't see it any more. the other continued to discend then leveled out and continued making a turn then straight again.  we watched it for about 5-10 minutes when the light blinked very dull then it went behind a cloud. my mother called for me to bring the binoculars to her house. three of them were watching it too.

approximately 8:45 pm

down at the lake a large glow. moving fast from west to east if i have my directions right. it was a bit smaller or further away than the earlier ones but was bright white as well. my youngest son saw one around the same time at a different location heading north-west.
content.summary: Glowing egg-like objects descending

content.detailedDescription:
We're witnessing some incredible things down here in austin.  sunday, 2/10, in particular revealed almost a dozen "ships" at dusk -- including a fiery head-on collison between a couple of the ships about 20��� east of the moon at around 7pm -- and after a huge yellow flash the larger of the two ships continued on its north east path as if it had "absorbed" the other ship.  also, that same evening, we witnessed a spectacular fly-over that shut my video camera down.  

last friday, 2/8, we saw one of the ships make an abrupt north to south turnaround, showing what appeared to be several windows and at least one "winged" craft riding on its back -- almost like an aircraft carrier.  we also saw a craft appear to completely combust only to return to its regular red, blue and white state as if nothing had happened.

it's extremely difficult to image these objects as they skirt the roofs of houses and are almost always obscured by trees -- but i've included several photographs for your inspection.  the 2/10 triangle was taken around 8pm in the western sky.  the triangle.2.212 was also imaged in the western sky at around 7:40pm.  notice the tandem orbs at the bottom left which mark, in my opinion, the nose of the triangle, at least in this picture, though it's my belief the "nose" can change positions in a nano-second -- as well as the entire orientation of the "triangle".

i believe the majority of these ships are composed of three hexagonal orbs, each possessing six secondary orbs -- allowing the ships to take on many forms from a single ball of light to a huge, brilliantly illuminated "aircraft-like" object.

i used photoshop's "colored pencil" effect to bring out the light wave connections between orbs in the image, ufo.212.Warp.

i never believed in ufos until they literally got in my face.  i may not know what they are but i know they're here.
content.summary: Ufo's a nightly occurence

content.detailedDescription: I took my son with me to pick up his older brother from the bus.  this was at 2:30 am. as we left town we saw on the right side in through the trees, a light.  at first i was just thinking it was a light on in someones house, until my son pointed out there are no houses through there.  about 5 minutes goes by, maybe a little less, there is a light up in the trees in front of us.  i was trying to make out if it was a street light when it disappeared.  as we got out to the middle of nowhere a car was coming.  we could see headlights.  my headlights had not reached that far yet and it appeared as though we would be going up hill, because it was higher than us.  as we approached it, i realised it was just sitting there.  the lights looked odd because there was a glow between them.  i began to slow down when the lights disappeared.  as we passed the area where it was, it was gone.  there was no place for it to go and there was no hill after all.  that was when i realised the object had to have been in the air.
content.summary: Headlights that hover and disappear

content.detailedDescription:
My husband left me a message on msn.  this is what he said:

darkblade sent 1/31/2008 9:07 pm:
hello
darkblade sent 1/31/2008 9:09 pm:
i saw a huge craft rite over me this morning 
darkblade sent 1/31/2008 9:10 pm:
my binoc batteries where dead
darkblade sent 1/31/2008 9:10 pm:
i am so pissed about that
darkblade sent 1/31/2008 9:10 pm:
was very exciting
darkblade sent 1/31/2008 9:11 pm:
i went and got new batteries
darkblade sent 1/31/2008 9:11 pm:
hope its there in morning
darkblade sent 1/31/2008 9:11 pm:
new batteries and kentucky fried chicken

i missed talking to him because my internet was off.  he will be home tonight!

he was on his machine.  this was approximately 6am. it was still dark. he saw a red light a long distance away.  he turned his machine to process a log and when he turned back the light had moved across the valley and had gotten very close to him in seconds. he could see a very large dark craft hovering. it was probably about 5 miles from him.  the lights were red and flashing and the craft was sitting still. he estimated the craft to be about the size of our small town. he stopped working and watched it for about 5 minutes before returning to his machine.  he didn't notice it leave but when looking the next time it was gone.

i am attaching a photo of the area.
content.summary: Red light moving fast

content.detailedDescription:
January 24th
my son and i were driving out of granisle and he saw a very bright red light above the trees on the left sitting still. less than two minutes later we saw the most beautiful red lights fly across the sky.  there were either three different craft or we saw one three times. i didn't get to see the shape but the red was the brightest and deepest i have ever seen. my son was looking through the binoculars and said it was triangular.  the first one which was the closest to us could very well have been a conventional aircraft i thought, except for the fact that we heard no sound and the red was like nothing i had ever seen before.  it was also out of place. also it was flying much lower than any jet i had seen in the area before, which are rarely noticed.  later, i finally witnessed one of the huge "planets" move significantly. it was the size of a dime and it moved noticeably fast.

january 25th
at 1:45 am this morning as i looked out our living room window i saw a white light flashing above the big mine area. i called my son to look and he got the binoculars. he said it was like a mother ship. we went out on the deck to look. sure enough, looking through the binoculars you could see it! there were red and white lights blinking all around it. red, white, red, white, red, white. it was like a strobe light and you could tell the lights were going all around it.  my son says triangular but i thought circular.  it just hovered there at the edge of and above the hill and over the lake.  i attempted to get a photo but it was just too far for my camera to pick up.  i didn't have my daughters video camera. it is really strange how we watched it for a few minutes got cold and then we both went in the house to carry on with whatever we were doing before that.  i think we have just seen so much lately. we never saw it leave.
content.summary: Strobe lights of a hovering object over a mine.

content.detailedDescription:
2-12-08

witness 1:

it was approximately 9:00 pm and my boyfriend and i were driving north, about 1 ��� miles west-southwest of town.  he saw a group of lights and pointed them out to me.  they were moving slowly and low in the sky. i knew right away these were not planes.  there were two groups of four bright white lights, in a straight line, one larger group above the other smaller group, similar to the shape of the ship on star trek.  the entire group slowly turned to the right, then split into two separate groups, each a group of four bright white lights with a red light underneath.  the two groups slowly passed over us and continued on toward the southeast until out of sight.  there was no noise at all, completely silent.  i am sure that it was not airplanes or a blimp.  i tried to take photographs, but wasn't sure if i was getting anything because it was so dark.  when we looked at our pictures later, i was shocked to find not only the two groups i was focusing on, but three more groups of different colors in the photo as well.  in the photo they appear zig-zagging, but they did not look like this by plain eyesight. i was amazed, excited, and nervous. i could not believe what i was seeing.  also, i circled three lights in the lower right hand corner of each photograph.  i don't know what these are, but they are the same in each photo.  they are not zig zagged like the others.  the photos were taken less than a minute apart.


witness 2:

it was around 9:00 pm, and my girlfriend and i were on the way to my house from the high school baseball game.  we were driving north down the road and i noticed some strange lights in the sky to my left.  i told her to look and she was surprised too.  there were four white lights and a red light.  the four white lights blinked in a rolling sequence and the red light did not blink at all.  i am sure they could not have been  planes because they were too close together and were moving very slowly and i could not hear anything.  they were low enough that i should have been able to hear something.  as they moved along, it seems that the red light was moving ahead of the white lights.  i have never seen anything like this.
content.summary: Configuration of lights that split into two separate groups

content.detailedDescription:
January 17th.
my daughter and i decided to go down to the lake to "star" watch before dark. we wanted to see the sky just as it was turning dark. between 5:30 pm and 6:00 pm. we watched the first stars forming. as we did this we saw a light in the sky moving fast. it flew over us and then did a u-turn and parked itself beside a star. it stayed there for the duration we were watching.As stars. across the lake, as usual we watched as a very large orange looking ball of light came up at the east from behind the trees and pulsed. it rose up and then to the right until it got smaller and looked like a planet. the colors in it are orange, blue, red, white and green. these ones are an every night thing. i don't know if they are planets but there are approximately 8 or more of these each night surrounding the town. each night lately at about 5:30 pm. we go out to watch night fall and see one or more objects (star size) move across the sky quickly and stop only to look like a star sitting still. do satellites stop and look starlike then move again.  i am not sure.
content.summary: Stars that move and planets that move quick and pulse

content.detailedDescription:
January 12th
my husband and i went down to the landing for dinner. on our way back, as we drove by the fisheries we saw a very large glowing light at the end of the fulton lake rd. the glow was the same as what we saw above the water tower only it didn't appear to be moving.  we decided to take a drive down to see what it was. it was very dark and kind of eery driving down it. as we just about reached the end and the light was growing brighter, a coyote came running fast toward the truck. my husband tried to stop but, not in time.  the coyote ran right under the front bumper, obviously scared of something it was running from. it didn't get hurt and took off into the bush.  we parked at the end of the road facing the lake. trees were covering the area that the glow was coming from. i wanted to go down the trail to see what it was, but at the same time i was a little freaked out. we stayed for about 10 minutes waiting for the light to rise up, and it didn't.  we left the area.  i was trying to think of what it might be.  i was thinking lamp posts or something, but the light was very big and my husband said it was coming from quite a distance. in that case there would be nothing out there that could do this because it is all thick forested area and lake.

january 13th.
my husband and i drove down to fulton during the day to see if there were any lights that would have made the huge glow. we walked down the trail and although there were two buildings close to where we parked, there were no lights that we could see on the outside of them. also, the glow would have been coming from much further down the lake.

january 14th.
one of my sons friends told him that he saw a huge glow far back in the trees on his way home from his girlfriends out of town.  this was in the evening.  my son asked him if it was near fulton and looking a little suprised he said it was. 

january 15th.
my daughter and i took a drive down to the fisheries this evening and tried to see if there were any lights coming from fulton. there were none. the glow was no longer there.
content.summary: Huge glowing light out of place

content.detailedDescription:
December 19th, 2007
it is the last week before xmas and i haven't even begun to xmas shop. we have had the tree up for a couple of weeks and all the lights and decorations. it really doesn't seem like xmas at all. 
my brother got some excellent video footage and photographs of what he thought was just a bright light above babine lake.  it turned out to be a lot more than that. he shot this footage just outside his door about a block from the lake.  first he got a photo of a bright white light above the lake. then an explosion of bright light and solid orbs.  then there is a saucer or disc. it is white with a black square on the side that moves around the disc and something that appears bright red and triangular hanging from the it.  he also got footage and photos of a capsule like thing and there is a rocket like flame coming from the under it. there appear to be markings all around this thing. he got this on his cell phone and we are trying to find ways to upload the images to our computer.  i video taped the cell phone video and then uploaded that onto the computer.  very nice video.  i still can't make out the markings but they seem to be geometrical shapes or something.  he hasn't given me permission to show the photos or video yet but i did make a drawing of it the best i could.
content.summary: Disc with video of it along with a capsule looking object

content.detailedDescription:
This morning one of our neighbours came over looking very terrified about the early early morning events he and his mother endured at approximately 3am. he wanted to see the footprints my kids had discovered the other night, so my son and daughter took him and another neighbor up to the watertower. 
it was still quite light out, early afternoon. as they walked up the hill and saw where the footprints were two nights before, they seemed to be missing. 
in the evening around 5:30-6 pm we got some video of the barge crossing the lake which would close down for the night and then one of the ufo's started up almost immediately after the barge landed. it took quite a few minutes but i finally managed to catch it on video. after a while i got the tripod set up and was able to focus in on the light. this ufo did not hover around the mountain side as usual but sat in one spot.  it looked as though the camera was being zoomed in and out when in fact noone touched the camera at all. i figure now, that the camera may have been auto focusing.  when looking through the telescope you could see that the ball of energy or light had a red saucer around it which you cannot see on the video.

my husband called after 7pm to tell me he did not want to go back to camp as he had a tall black spindly figure standing in his small room by the door at 2 am. he said he was paralized in fear.

tonight my son was very irritated and upset/agitated and took off out the door saying he was going to hitchhike. i followed him in the truck and he told me to leave. i did, and went home and called my daughter. she said she would get her b/f to go look for him. my other daughter and i were talking in the kitchen and after a while i opened the kitchen door to the dining room and saw my son sitting in a chair. he was crying. i tried to talk to him about why he left and he wasn't concerned about that but was about what happened outside. he said he walked down the granisle hwy to the church and there were cricket sounding noises that got very loud in his head. he saw a very dark tall figure standing by the church. he ran. when he got close to home the noise got very loud in his head until he fell to his knees in so much pain. he was horribly upset, dizzy and somewhat disoriented when i talked to him. he began to get what felt like a migraine and was given some advil.
the b/f came to the door and i told him that my son was here so he left. my son got very frightened telling me to give the b/f a ride because something could happen to him. the b/f was already running and it was too late so i called my daughter. i told her to call me when he arrived at her place. several min. later she called.  then, within half an hour i was taking a shower, very nervous and my other daughter started knocking on the bathroom door telling me to hurry get out. i did and dressed while running out the door. she was on the phone with my other daughter who was telling her that there was something in her bathroom.
she was just telling her b/f about my sons experience when she saw a dark shadow go very quickly down her hall. then there was a green pulsating light coming from beneath the bathroom door and then a shadow moving. the b/f was getting it on video as she was talking on the phone. there was an odour of rotten eggs in the room and the cat was sniffing the air and then began to go "crazy"
we all jumped in the truck and got over there fast and picked them up. 

again, i have video but don't know how to upload them.
content.summary: Ball of energy with disc and objects shooting in and out of it.

content.detailedDescription:
As i sit here typing this, it is 2:40 am monday, december 17th and from my window i can see one of the ufo's between the lodge and the resort at the lake.

today my son came for a visit. he and one of his roommates along with two others who live in granisle and tatchet watched the ufo's across the lake for quite a while this evening around 6pm. 

they were really very active. 

later, not sure of the time, another person from tatchet and a friend of his watched with us while we witnessed a white streak of light come out of the cloud and as it got close to the ground it split in two like a fork and appeared to land over by the mine.

my husband contacted me and said he had a solid orb in his bathroom at the logging camp tonight.
 

tonight from home my family watched them at the lake on and off until 3 am tuesday morning.
content.summary: White light shoots across sky, splitting in two and lands near mine

content.detailedDescription:
as i was talking to my husband online i received an urgent phone call around 10 pm or so. it was my mom and she says, "get up here! it is huge!"   
apparently she heard her dog vomiting outside and as she opened the door to get him, she immediately saw a huge, bright light appear and she called her husband out to see as well. she said "at first i thought someone turned on their snowmobile light in the fog."  it lifted up and under it there were a bunch of white glowing smaller balls of light. by the time we (my youngest 17 year old son and my 21 year old daughter) got up there we saw a huge glow above the water tower about the size of a football field maybe bigger. it was hovering up and down. it remained there for a good half hour before it began to glide what seemed to be away from us further into the hills...I called my other daughter, wanting her video camera.  she was too late getting it to me.
eventually the light, which was now a blue glow in the strategically placed fog and seemed to move farther back up or around the mountain. finally the fog became a thick black cloud with a perfect glowing white outline. the cloud was lying low, covering only the area where the light was emanating from, and sometimes there appeared to be holes in the cloud straight through to the glow. that went on for about an hour longer but it slowly faded down to a dull blue glow in and the cloud wasn't as black anymore. 
my two daughters, youngest son and the b/f decided to walk up to the water tower, much to my dismay. on the way up my oldest daughter and the b/f each witnessed an orb cross their path ahead, then they came across some very strange footprints (not human) in the snow, and saw a flash in the woods, at which point she began photographing and making a video of the prints. as they got closer to the water tower, they saw more flashes. they were small flashing points in the darkness between the trees, "like someone flicking a lighter". then they noticed a steady glowing orb higher in a tree, less than 20 feet away from where they were on the road, probably about 15-20 feet up the tree. at that point they realized that something was there looking straight at them and it was time to go home. on the way down the hill they all smelled a strong pungeant rotten egg odour.
when we see these things i wish at the time that there were others around to see it as well. my fear is that i would run up to one of the houses and bang on the door, and drag someone out, only to find the things gone. i would feel so foolish. these things happen so fast and then you are afraid to look away incase you miss something.

i haven't found out how to get the video's to you without placing them on youtube, which i don't want to do.  please let me know how if there is another way.  i am sending a photo of the prints.  i hope they won't be distributed as they belong to my daughter. they are for mufon use only please.  also, we don't know how to change the date or time on the video camera.  it was bought in october, 2007 but has the date 2000 on it.
content.summary: Very large craft lands behind house

content.detailedDescription:
December 16th, 2007
we took more pictures of the house next door and even peered into the window in the daylight and have come to the unanimous agreement that the shape of the alien in the photo cannot be explained away by reflections or anything else. there is nothing in the space the shape occupied. 

they are out in full force tonight december 16th. starting around 7 pm. we ran out the door, me in my bare feet so didn't even look at the time.  there were 4 smaller ones that we could see very plainly zipping around and up and down and all around and they go very fast at times, but they swayed like attached by a string from side to side when they were more stationary. they were saucer shape and had orange lights.  we also saw the big ship (jet sounding) flew over us and then a while later coming another way and stopped then disappeared then again looked as if it was coming toward us and then disappeared. very loud.  

i was talking to my husband who left this afternoon for logging camp. he said that he was followed all the way to topley by a craft. it flew along side him at quite a distance. now as he sits in his bunk house there is banging and crashing going on and something on the roof. he is the only one in there as it is sunday and the rest of the guys don't come till monday.

we have such useless camera's.  it is so dark, when you try to capture the objects, they don't show up in the lense.  next time i am just going to start shooting and see if anything shows up.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Four searching objects and one flying above
